summary: Raj\'s Restoration Spells provides players with up to 100 new restoration spells (30 in the \"Lite\" version and 14 in the \"Mastery\" version). .
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ms0s4y.png[/IMG]
[size=4][color=9b7850]Raj\'s Restoration Spells provides players with up to 100 new restoration spells (30 in the \"Lite\" version and 14 in the \"Mastery\" version). This includes all of the old Fortify, Resist, and Cure abilities from Morrowind and Oblivion, as well as fourteen new Master level spells. The Lite and Mastery versions are compatible with one another. [/size][/color][/center]

[size=3][b][u]Information[/u][/b][/size]

Find the Kahjiit named Raj or his twin brother Rai hiding behind the Bannered Mare in Whiterun to buy these exotic Spelltomes from the far away lands of Morrowind and Cyrodiil.

These spells have been balanced into the game by price, mana cost, skill level, and power to the best of my ability. 

The Raj\'s Restoration 100 version of this mod offers players one-hundred Restoration spells. There are \"Lesser\"(Apprentice), regular (Adept) and \"Greater\"(Expert) versions of each of the Fortify and Resist spells. As well as Cure Poison, Cure Disease, three versions of a heal over time spell called Rejuvenation and fourteen new custom spells in the style of the Restoration School.

The Raj\'s Restoration Lite version of this mod offers players thirty essential Restoration spells. There is one version of each of the Fortify and Resist Spells equal to the \"Greater\"(Expert) spells in the \"100\" version. As well as Cure Poison and Cure Disease. 

The Raj\'s Restoration Mastery version of this mod offers players only the fourteen custom Master level Restoration spells from the \"100\" version and the \"Greater\" version of the heal over time spell. 

There is also another optional file filled with spells for testing purposes. Find the \"Test Chest\" behind the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. Try them out and let me know your thoughts about them on the comments page. Thanks in advance!

The spells provided are listed below with a short description.


[size=3][b][u]Aprrentice Level Spells (100 Version)[/u][/b][/size]

Lesser Fortify Health ------ Fortify Health by 25 for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Magicka ------ Fortify Magicka by 25 for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Stamina	------ Fortify Stamina by 25 for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Alchemy	------ Fortify Alchemy by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Alteration ------ Fortify Alteration by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Archery	------ Fortify Archery by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Block ------ Fortify Block by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Conjuration ------ Fortify Conjuration by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Destruction ------ Fortify Destruction by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Enchanting ------ Fortify Enchanting by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Heavy Armor ------ Fortify Heavy Armor by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Illusion ------ Fortify Illusion by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Light Armor ------ Fortify Light Armor by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Lockpicking ------ Fortify Lockpicking by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify One-Handed ------ Fortify One-Handed by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Pickpocket ------ Fortify Pickpocket by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Restoration ------ Fortify Restoration by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Smithing	------ Fortify Smithing by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Sneak ------ Fortify Sneak by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Speech ------ Fortify Speech by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Fortify Two-Handed ------ Fortify Two-Handed by 10 points for 30 seconds
Lesser Resist Fire ------ Increases resistance to Fire by 25% for 25 seconds
Lesser Resist Frost ------ Increases resistance to Frost by 25% for 25 seconds
Lesser Resist Shock ------ Increases resistance to Shock by 25% for 25 seconds
Lesser Resist Magicka	------ Increases resistance to Magicka by 25% for 25 seconds
Lesser Resist Disease ------ Increases resistance to Diseae by 25% for 25 seconds
Lesser Resist Poison ------ Increases resistance to Poison by 25% for 25 seconds
Lesser Rejuvenation ------ Restore 2 Health and Stamina per second for 20 seconds.


[size=3][b][u]Adept Level Spells (100 Version)[/u][/b][/size]

Fortify Health ----- Fortify Health by 50 for 45 seconds
Fortify Magicka ------ Fortify Magicka by 50 for 45 seconds
Fortify Stamina ------ Fortify Stamina by 50 for 45 seconds
Fortify Alchemy ------ Fortify Alchemy by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Alteration ------ Fortify Alteration by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Archery ------ Fortify Archery by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Block ------ Fortify Block by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Conjuration ------ Fortify Conjuration by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Destruction ------ Fortify Destruction by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Enchanting ------ Fortify Enchanting by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Heavy Armor ------ Fortify Heavy Armor by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Illusion ------ Fortify Illusion by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Light Armor ------ Fortify Light Armor by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Lockpicking ------ Fortify Lockpicking by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify One-Handed ------ Fortify One-Handed by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Pickpocket ------ Fortify Pickpocket by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Restoration ------ Fortify Restoration by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Smithing ------ Fortify Smithing by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Sneak ------ Fortify Sneak by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Speech ------ Fortify Speech by 20 points for 45 seconds
Fortify Two-Handed ------ Fortify Two-Handed by 20 points for 45 seconds
Resist Fire ------ Increases resistance to Fire by 50% for 30 seconds
Resist Frost ------ Increases resistance to Frost by 50% for 30 seconds
Resist Shock ------ Increases resistance to Shock by 50% for 30 seconds
Resist Magicka ------ Increases resistance to Magicka by 50% for 30 seconds
Resist Disease ------ Increases resistance to Disease by 50% for 30 seconds
Resist Poison ------ Increases resistance to Poison by 50% for 30 seconds
Rejuvenation ------ Restore 3 Health and Stamina per second for 30 seconds.


[size=3][b][u]Expert Level Spells (100 & Lite Versions)[/u][/b][/size]

Cure Disease ------ Removes all disease effects from the player
Cure Poison ------ Removes all poison effects from the player
Greater Fortify Health ------ Fortify Health by 100 for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Magicka ------ Fortify Magicka by 100 for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Stamina ------ Fortify Stamina by 100 for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Alchemy ------ Fortify Alchemy by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Alteration -------Fortify Alteration by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Archery ------ Fortify Archery by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Block ------ Fortify Block by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Conjuration ------ Fortify Conjuration by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Destruction	------ Fortify Destruction by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Enchanting ------ Fortify Enchanting by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Heavy Armor	------ Fortify Heavy Armor by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Illusion ------ Fortify Illusion by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Light Armor ------ Fortify Light Armor by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Lockpicking	------ Fortify Lockpicking by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify One-Handed ------ Fortify One-Handed by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Pickpocket ------ Fortify Pickpocket by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Restoration ------ Fortify Restoration by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Smithing ------ Fortify smithing by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Sneak ------ Fortify Sneak by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Speech ------ Fortify Speech by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Fortify Two-Handed	 ------ Fortify Two-Handed by 40 points for 60 seconds
Greater Resist Fire ------ Increases resistance to Fire by 75% for 45 seconds
Greater Resist Frost ------ Increases resistance to Frost by 75% for 45 seconds
Greater Resist Shock ------ Increases resistance to Shock by 75% for 45 seconds
Greater Resist Magicka	 ------ Increases resistance to Magicka by 75% for 45 seconds
Greater Resist Disease	 ------ Increases resistance to Disease by 75% for 45 seconds
Greater Resist Poison	------ Increases resistance to Poison by 75% for 45 seconds
Greater Rejuvenation	------ Restore 5 Health and Stamina per second for 45 seconds


[size=3][b][u]Master Level Spells (100 & Mastery Versions)[/u][/b][/size]

Ageis	 ------ Fortifies all of the caster\'s defences
Aspect of the Assassin ------ The caster is empowered by the spirit of an Assassin
Aspect of the Battlemage ------ The caster is empowered by the spirit of a Battlemage
Aspect of the Berserker ------ The caster is empowered by the spirit of a Berserker
Aspect of the Priest ------ The caster is empowered by the spirit of a Priest
Aspect of the Ranger	------- The caster is empowered by the spirit of a Ranger
Aspect of the Rogue ------- The caster is empowered by the spirit of a Rogue
Aspect of the Soldier ------- The caster is empowered by the spirit of a Soldier
Aspect of the Spellsword ------- The caster is empowered by the spirit of a Spellsword
Aspect of the Wizard ------- The caster is empowered by the spirit of a Wizard
Divine Accuracy	 ------- Fortifies the casters critical chance
Divine Resistance	 ------- Fortifies the casters resistance to Disease and Poison
Divine Word ------ Divine power momenterially staggers the target
Elemental Protection ------ Fortifies the casters resistance to the Elements


[size=3][b][u]Version notes[/u][/b][/size]

1.1 Fixed descriptions and chest
1.2 Fixed perk bug that was causing the spells to apply perks to players and not the player\'s perk apply to the spells.

[u]Other Notes[/u]
No longer supported. I do not plan to purchase Hearthfire due to a personal distaste for the product and so cannot mod with the new content. This mod should still work with unexpanded Skyrim (and Dawnguard if noted as such). Sorry for any inconvenience but with this game being almost a year old I feel it\'s time to move on to newer modding horizons. Thank you to everyone who downloaded and enjoyed my Skyrim mods. I hope to see you all again in other mod workshops. Best wishes!
author: KahjiitRaj
